Class RegularVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
RegularVendingMachine
public class RegularVendingMachine extends Object
The RegularVendingMachine class represents a vending machine that sells items using denominations and keeps track of sales and inventory. It allows adding and removing ingredients, updating prices, handling user denominations, and dispensing change to customers.

  • Constructor Details

    • RegularVendingMachine

      public RegularVendingMachine(String name, int numberOfSlots)
      Creates a new RegularVendingMachine instance with the given name and number of slots.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the vending machine.
      numberOfSlots - The number of slots in the vending machine.

  • Method Details

    • sortDenominationsDescending

      public void sortDenominationsDescending()
      Sorts the denominations in descending order based on their values.

    • dispenseChange

      public Change dispenseChange(int amountToPay, int amountInserted)
      Dispenses change to the customer after a purchase.
      Parameters:
      amountToPay - The amount to be paid for the item.
      amountInserted - The amount inserted by the customer.
      Returns:
      A Change object containing the denominations for the change, or null if change cannot be given.

    • addIngredient

      public boolean addIngredient(String name, int calories, int price, int quantity)
      Adds an ingredient to the vending machine slots or increases its quantity if it already exists.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to add.
      calories - The calories of the ingredient to add.
      price - The price of the ingredient to add.
      quantity - The quantity of the ingredient to add.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully added or updated, false otherwise.

    • addQuantity

      public boolean addQuantity(String name, int quantity)
      Increases the quantity of an existing ingredient in the vending machine slots.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to add.
      quantity - The quantity of the ingredient to add.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient quantity was successfully increased, false otherwise.

    • selectItem

      public Ingredient selectItem(String itemName)
      Selects an item (ingredient) from the vending machine slots based on its name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to select.
      Returns:
      The selected Ingredient instance, or null if the item is not found.

    • removeItem

      public boolean removeItem(String itemName)
      Removes an item (ingredient) from the vending machine slots based on its name.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the item was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • addSlot

      public boolean addSlot(ArrayList<Ingredient> slot)
      Adds a new slot (ingredient) to the vending machine slots.
      Parameters:
      slot - The ArrayList of ingredients to add as a new slot.
      Returns:
      true if the slot was successfully added, false if the maximum number of slots is reached.

    • removeIngredient

      public boolean removeIngredient(String itemname)
      Removes an ingredient slot (a group of the same ingredients) from the vending machine slots.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the ingredient to remove from the slots.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient slot was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • addDenomination

      public boolean addDenomination(int value)
      Adds a new denomination to the vending machine's list of available denominations.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the denomination to add.
      Returns:
      true if the denomination was successfully added, false if the value is not valid.

    • addUserDenomination

      public boolean addUserDenomination(int value)
      Adds a new denomination to the user's list of inserted denominations.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the denomination to add.
      Returns:
      true if the denomination was successfully added, false if the value is not valid.

    • collectDenomination

      public boolean collectDenomination(int value, int quantity)
      Collects a specific quantity of a denomination from the vending machine's list of available denominations.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the denomination to collect.
      quantity - The quantity of the denomination to collect.
      Returns:
      true if the specified quantity of the denomination was successfully collected, false otherwise.

    • createSummary

      public String createSummary()
      Generates a summary of sales and inventory since the last maintenance.
      Returns:
      A string containing the summary of sales and inventory.

    • countIngredient

      public int countIngredient(String ingredientName)
      Counts the occurrences of a specific ingredient in the vending machine slots.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to count occurrences for.
      Returns:
      The number of occurrences of the specified ingredient in the vending machine slots.

    • updateCurrentBalance

      public void updateCurrentBalance()
      Updates the current balance of the vending machine based on the available denominations.

      Updates the current user balance based on the user-inserted denominations.

      Updates the starting inventory based on the current inventory.

      public void updateCurrentInventory()
      Updates the current inventory based on the vending machine slots.

    • updateSales

      public void updateSales(String itemName)
      Updates the sales record for a specific item (ingredient) sold.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item (ingredient) sold.

    • setPrice

      public boolean setPrice(String itemName, int price)
      Sets the price of an existing item (ingredient) in the vending machine slots.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to set the price for.
      price - The new price of the item.
      Returns:
      true if the price was successfully set, false if the item is not found.
